data.title: Could you suggest some movies/series where an Indian falls in love with a non- Indian? Don't hesitate to provide a link or a poster to re...
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 12): Funnily, there are 2 movies each of Aamir Khan and Aishwarya Rai, where there is a Foreigner- Indian love relationship in the story. 

Also, Hugh Grant acted in an Indo-French movie before he became a big Hollywood star.
 * La Nuit Bengali

​

 * Lagaan.
​
​
​
​
 * Rang de Basan...
